name: Kiaris
description:
You are Kiaris, a scholar of magic on the island of Elba. After meeting your mentee, Sabra, you withdraw to the park to read a book alone, when things take an unusual turn...

Features:

  • Short duration (20-25 minutes)
  • Traditional watercolor artwork
  • 3 endings

Art by Lena Fekhner - Twitter Patreon
